Action.body: ~esplinr - I added this story to the "Monitoring" epic. Not sure if the "Stability" epic is more appropriate.

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: This write-up helped to influence our thinking, and we extended validator-info to include much of this functionality. At this point Evernym, IBM, and the Sovrin Foundation have monitoring set up for the network based on those tools. Additional monitoring functionality should be implemented by the administrators of Indy networks. If we need tools in Indy core to assist, we will create separate issues to track the work.
